subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: David West had 20 points and 10 rebounds, and the New Orleans Hornets turned in another dominating performance in a 99-85 victory against the host Charlotte Bobcats on Friday night.
snippet: David West had 20 points and 10 rebounds, and the New Orleans Hornets turned in another dominating performance in a 99-85 victory against the host Charlotte Bobcats on Friday night.
